data.title: CAS 2 New Set of Questions
data.meta_description: CAS-2-New-Set-of-Questions - Read online for free. The document contains 30 multiple choice questions about topics related to education, culture, community, and leadership. The questions assess understanding of key concepts from sociology of education like cultural transmission processes, theories of inequality in schooling, the role of schools and teachers in communities, and collaboration between internal and external stakeholders. Sample questions address the functions of teacher-parent relationships, characteristics of different leadership styles, and how major sociological theories view the role of culture in education.
